text: The following are the cities in the state of Tamil Nadu, India, which have a population of 1 lakh and above (city / corporation area only). This list is based on the 2011 census conducted by Government of India. == Population details == Rank Name District Population 2011 1 Chennai Chennai 7,088,000 2 Coimbatore Coimbatore 1,301,438 3 Madurai Madurai 962,420 4 Tiruchirappalli Tiruchirappalli 916,857 5 Tiruppur Tiruppur 877,778 6 Salem Salem 829,267 7 Erode Erode 498,129 8 Tirunelveli Tirunelveli 497,326 9 Vellore Vellore 484,690 10 Thoothukkudi Thoothukkudi 410,760 11 Nagercoil Kanyakumari 224,329 12 Thanjavur Thanjavur 222,943 13 Dindigul Dindigul 207,327 14 Kanchipuram Kanchipuram 221,749 15 Kovilpatti Thoothukudi 178,620 16 Cuddalore Cuddalore 173,361 17 Tiruvannamalai Tiruvannamalai 145,683 18 Kumbakonam Thanjavur 140,156 19 Rajapalayam Virudhunagar 130,119 20 Pudukottai Pudukottai 117,215 21 Hosur Krishnagiri 116,821 22 Ambur Vellore 114,608 23 Karaikkudi Sivaganga 106,714 24 Neyveli Cuddalore 105,731 25 Nagapattinam Nagapattinam 102,905 ==References==
title: List of cities in Tamil Nadu by population
